Bdd

simple assertions for use with testament

Types

TddError = ref object of CatchableError

What = enum
  should,                   ## be true
  shouldNot,                ## be true
  shouldNotRaise,           ## error when called
  shouldRaise,              ## error when called
  shouldRaiseMsg             ## when called
